verses.verse: Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> is the wood <S%H6086><s%> of the vine <S%H1612><s%> [better] than <S%H4480><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> of a branch <S%H2156><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is among the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the forest <S%H9194><s%>?

"Can wood <S%H6086><s%> be taken <S%H3947><s%> from it to make <S%H6213><s%> anything, <S%H4399><s%> or <S%H518><s%> can [men] take <S%H3947><s%> a peg <S%H3489><s%> from it on which to hang <S%H8518><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%>?

"If <S%H2009><s%> it has been put <S%H5414><s%> into the fire <S%H784><s%> for fuel, <S%H402><s%> [and] the fire <S%H784><s%> has consumed <S%H398><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of its ends, <S%H7098><s%> and its middle <S%H8432><s%> part <S%H8432><s%> has been <S%H2787><s%> charred, <S%H2787><s%> is it [then] useful <S%H6743><s%> for anything <S%H4399><s%>?

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> while it is intact, <S%H8549><s%> it is not made <S%H6213><s%> into anything. <S%H4399><s%> How <S%H637><s%> much <S%H637><s%> less, <S%H637><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> has consumed <S%H398><s%> it and it is charred, <S%H2787><s%> can it still <S%H5750><s%> be made <S%H6213><s%> into anything! <S%H4399><s%>

"Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'As the wood <S%H6086><s%> of the vine <S%H1612><s%> among the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the forest, <S%H9194><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> to the fire <S%H784><s%> for fuel, <S%H402><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> have I given <S%H5414><s%> up the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%>

and I set <S%H5414><s%> My face <S%H6440><s%> against them. [Though] they have come <S%H3318><s%> out of the fire, <S%H784><s%> yet the fire <S%H784><s%> will consume <S%H398><s%> them. Then you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> I set <S%H7760><s%> My face <S%H6440><s%> against them.

'Thus I will make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> desolate, <S%H8077><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> they have acted <S%H4603><s%> unfaithfully, <S%H4604><s%>'" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>
